page.title: 14OUR HOMES
page.content:
Some of the homes in{Merton}are quite old. Martin Luxton writes---"Our house is 200 years old.It has eight rooms. These are a front room,a living room a kitchen,a cold room,a bathroom and 3 bedrooms.There is also an attic."
Many of the homes in the parish are built of traditional materials. Steven Watson writes---"My home is a small cottage made of stone and cob with a slate roof. The walls are very thick (about 50cms.) and this makes it warm in winter and cool in summer."
Quite a few of our homes have needed recent modernisation Douglas Padbury writes---"My home had no bathroom so my dad built a bathroom on the landing."
